statements: SELECT * FROM CropWaterUsage;
SELECT crop_name, water_usage FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE water_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM CropWaterUsage ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT crop_name, water_usage FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE crop_name LIKE 'R%';
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM CropWaterUsage;
SELECT crop_name, water_usage FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE water_usage < 50 ORDER BY crop_id DESC
SELECT crop_name, irrigation_schedule FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE irrigation_schedule LIKE '%day%'
SELECT crop_name, water_usage, irrigation_schedule FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE crop_name IN ('Tomato', 'Corn', 'Wheat')
SELECT crop_name, water_usage FROM CropWaterUsage WHERE crop_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirements FROM crops;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, irrigation_date, duration FROM crops JOIN irrigation_schedule ON crops.crop_id = irrigation_schedule.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirements FROM crops WHERE water_requirements > 5;
SELECT * FROM crops
SELECT crop_name, water_requirements FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC
SELECT irrigation_date, duration FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE crop_id = 1
SELECT crop_name, water_requirements FROM crops WHERE water_requirements >= 5 AND crop_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE duration BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY irrigation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM crop;
SELECT crop_name, water_need FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT crop_id, field_id, water_amount FROM schedule WHERE water_amount >= 100 ORDER BY water_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field WHERE area > 100;
SELECT schedule_id, crop_name, field_name, start_date, end_date FROM schedule s JOIN crop c ON s.crop_id = c.crop_id JOIN field f ON s.field_id = f.field_id;
SELECT crop_name, water_need FROM crop WHERE water_need < 10;
SELECT field_id, field_name, SUM(water_amount) AS total_water FROM schedule s JOIN field f ON s.field_id = f.field_id GROUP BY field_id, field_name;
SELECT * FROM crop;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement FROM crop ORDER BY water_requirement DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, crop_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT source_name FROM water_source;

SELECT crop_name, SUM(water_used) AS total_water_used FROM crop c INNER JOIN irrigation_schedule s ON c.crop_id = s.crop_id INNER JOIN irrigation_log l ON s.schedule_id = l.schedule_id GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM crop WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement FROM crop WHERE water_requirement > 10.5;
SELECT source_name, water_capacity FROM water_source ORDER BY water_capacity DESC;
SELECT crop_name, start_time, end_time FROM crop JOIN irrigation_schedule ON crop.crop_id = irrigation_schedule.crop_id;
SELECT log_id, water_used, timestamp FROM irrigation_log WHERE water_used < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT farmer_name FROM farmers WHERE farmer_id = 1;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farm WHERE farmer_id = 2;
SELECT farm_id, crop_id FROM farm_crop_mapping WHERE farm_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM crops;
SELECT crop_name, water_requirement FROM crops WHERE water_requirement > 5.0;
SELECT farm_name, farm_location FROM farm WHERE farm_location LIKE '%California%';

SELECT farmers.farmer_name, crops.crop_name FROM farmers JOIN farm ON farmers.farmer_id = farm.farmer_id JOIN farm_crop_mapping ON farm_crop_mapping.farm_id = farm.farm_id JOIN crops ON farm_crop_mapping.crop_id = crops.crop_id;

SELECT farm_name, crop_name, water_amount FROM farm JOIN farm_crop_mapping ON farm.farm_id = farm_crop_mapping.farm_id JOIN crops ON farm_crop_mapping.crop_id = crops.crop_id JOIN irrigation_schedule ON crops.crop_id = irrigation_schedule.crop_id WHERE irrigation_schedule.water_amount > 10.0;
